title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Export multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier, provide a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip), and initiate the export process.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box appears indicating that problems were encountered during the export. The details of the error specify the file with the same name in project2 as the source of the problem.
EB: Exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file should complete successfully without any error message or issues.
SR:
1. Open the "Export" dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Provide a name for the zip file.
4. Initiate the export process.
5. Verify that the export completes successfully without any error message or issues.
